title: Viña del Mar International Song Festival
resume: The Viña del Mar International Song Festival  is a music festival that has been held annually during the 3rd week of February in Viña del Mar, Chile. Started in 1960, it is the largest and best known music festival in Latin America , it has been aired  on Television since 1963
